sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Terra Innovatum Global sets executive compensation and awards bonuses to key officers
feed.summary: Terra Innovatum Global N.V. (NASDAQ:NKLR) has announced new directorship agreements and approved bonus payments for its executives and officers of its wholly-owned subsidiary, Terra Innovatum s.r.l. These decisions were made by the Remuneration Committee, outlining fixed annual compensation for key roles and additional bonuses in recognition of the company's business combination and Nasdaq listing. The agreements also include provisions for termination and intellectual property.

feed.title: Terra Innovatum Global sets executive compensation and awards bonuses to key officers
feed.summary: Terra Innovatum Global N.V. (NASDAQ:NKLR) has announced new directorship agreements and bonus payments for its executives. The Remuneration Committee approved fixed annual compensation for Alessandro Petruzzi (€500,000 for 2025, €558,000 for 2026), Massimo Morichi (€400,000 for 2025, €450,000 for 2026), and Cesare Frepoli (€450,000 for 2025, €500,000 for 2026), along with eligibility for performance-based bonuses. Additionally, bonuses were awarded to officers of its subsidiary, Terra Innovatum s.r.l., for the company's business combination and Nasdaq listing.

feed.title: Terra Innovatum Global sets executive compensation and awards bonuses to key officers By Investing.com
feed.summary: Terra Innovatum Global N.V. (NASDAQ:NKLR) has announced new directorship agreements and approved bonus payments for its executives. CEO Alessandro Petruzzi, CSO Massimo Morichi, and COO Cesare Frepoli will receive fixed annual compensation for 2025 and 2026, along with eligibility for performance-based bonuses. Additionally, significant bonus payments were approved for several officers in recognition of the company’s business combination and Nasdaq listing.

feed.title: Terra Innovatum Global stock rating reiterated at Buy by Benchmark
feed.summary: Benchmark has reiterated its Buy rating and $19.00 price target on Terra Innovatum Global (NASDAQ:NKLR) due to accelerated engagement with the Nuclear Regulatory Commission following a government shutdown. The company is making progress on regulatory submissions for its Solo micro-modular reactor and analysts expect it to achieve profitability this year. Despite past volatility, its licensing path is seen as preferential, and recent collaborations hint at promising growth.

feed.title: Terra Innovatum Advances SOLO Reactor Licensing Through Expanded NRC Submissions
feed.summary: Terra Innovatum Global N.V. has made significant progress in licensing its SOLO™ Micro-Modular Reactor (MMR) through extensive engagements and submissions with the U.S. Nuclear Regulatory Commission (NRC). The company detailed crucial aspects like reactor design, safety philosophy, and a unique emergency planning zone profile, demonstrating its alignment with modern regulatory frameworks for microreactors. This proactive licensing approach aims to expedite construction and commercial operations to meet public and private sector demand.

feed.title: Terra Innovatum Global stock rating reiterated at Buy by Benchmark
feed.summary: Benchmark has reiterated its Buy rating and $19.00 price target for Terra Innovatum Global (NASDAQ:NKLR) due to accelerated engagement with the Nuclear Regulatory Commission following a government shutdown. This target represents a significant 286% upside from the current price, with analysts expecting the company to achieve profitability this year. Terra Innovatum is progressing with regulatory submissions for its Solo micro-modular reactor, aiming for a construction permit by mid-2026.

feed.title: Terra Innovatum Global Earns Special Mention for Sustainability at 2025 UNCA Awards
feed.summary: Terra Innovatum Global N.V. received a Special Mention for Sustainability at the 2025 United Nations Correspondents Association (UNCA) Awards Gala for its SOLO™ Micro-Modular Reactor. The company's innovative technology, which aims to provide clean, affordable, and scalable nuclear energy, was recognized for its potential to advance energy equity and sustainable development globally. Terra Innovatum Global is fully funded with $131 million and expects regulatory approval for its first reactor by late 2027, with commercialization in 2028.

feed.title: Terra Innovatum Global stock rating reiterated at Buy by Benchmark
feed.summary: Benchmark has reiterated its Buy rating and $19.00 price target on Terra Innovatum Global (NASDAQ:NKLR) due to accelerated engagement with the NRC, despite the company not currently being profitable. Analysts anticipate the company will achieve profitability this year with a forecasted EPS of $0.03. Recent developments include successful licensing progress for its SOLO™ Micro-Modular Reactor and a partnership with Uvation Inc. for a nuclear-powered data center pilot.

feed.title: Terra Innovatum advances licensing for micro-modular nuclear reactor
feed.summary: Terra Innovatum Global N.V. (NASDAQ:NKLR) has significantly progressed in licensing its SOLO™ Micro-Modular Reactor (MMR) by actively engaging with the U.S. Nuclear Regulatory Commission (NRC). Despite federal shutdowns, the company held over 10 meetings with the NRC in the last quarter of 2025, submitting key technical and regulatory documents. This effort aligns with the NRC's framework for low-consequence reactors, and Terra Innovatum plans to submit its Preliminary Safety Analysis Report for a Construction Permit application.

feed.title: Terra Innovatum Accelerates Licensing Process For Its SOLO™ Reactor With The NRC
feed.summary: Terra Innovatum is accelerating the licensing process for its SOLO™ micro-modular reactor with the U.S. Nuclear Regulatory Commission (NRC) despite a partial federal shutdown. The company has submitted key technical reports covering design, emergency planning, and fuel, leveraging historical operational materials to limit supply chain risks. This proactive engagement aligns with the NRC's ongoing efforts to modernize regulatory frameworks specifically for microreactors.

feed.title: Terra Innovatum advances licensing for micro-modular nuclear reactor
feed.summary: Terra Innovatum Global N.V. (NASDAQ:NKLR) has significantly advanced the licensing of its SOLO™ Micro-Modular Reactor (MMR) through extensive engagement with the U.S. Nuclear Regulatory Commission (NRC). The company held over 10 meetings with the NRC in Q4 2025, submitting key technical and regulatory documents that align with the NRC's framework for low-consequence reactors. This progress is supported by broader regulatory developments, with a draft proposed rule for microreactor licensing expected by February, and Terra Innovatum plans to submit its Preliminary Safety Analysis Report soon.

feed.title: Check out Terra Innovatum Global NV's stock price (M2W-FF) in real time
feed.summary: This article provides real-time stock information for Terra Innovatum Global NV (M2W-FF) traded on the Frankfurt Stock Exchange. The stock is currently trading at 4.06 EUR, down 9.17% from its previous close, and has hit a new 52-week low. Key stats related to the company's financials such as market capitalization, shares outstanding, and dividend information are not available.

feed.title: Terra Innovatum initiated Buy at B. Riley with shares trading a 'mega-discount' (NKLR:NASDAQ)
feed.summary: B. Riley initiated coverage of Terra Innovatum Global (NKLR) with a Buy rating and a $10 price target, citing the company's potential to capitalize on growing power demand through its advanced nuclear technology. NKLR shares saw an 11.8% increase in Wednesday's trading following this news.

feed.title: Terra Innovatum stock initiated with Buy rating at B.Riley on nuclear tech
feed.summary: B.Riley initiated coverage on Terra Innovatum Global (NASDAQ: NKLR) with a Buy rating and a $10.00 price target. The firm believes Terra Innovatum is well-positioned to capitalize on growing power demand with its advanced nuclear technology, particularly its 1 MWe/4 MWt microreactor, SOLO, which uses low-enriched uranium. Despite facing financial challenges, analysts predict the company will be profitable this year and has strategic plans to deploy a test reactor by late 2027 and secure commercial license approval by 2028.

feed.title: B. Riley Securities Initiates Coverage of Terra Innovatum Global N.V. (NKLR) with Buy Recommendation
feed.summary: B. Riley Securities has initiated coverage of Terra Innovatum Global N.V. (NKLR) with a Buy recommendation. Fintel reports this initiation, and also highlights that Meteora Capital holds 2.291 million shares in the company. The article emphasizes Fintel's comprehensive investing research platform for various users.

feed.title: Terra Innovatum (NASDAQ: NKLR) LOI for 1 MWe SOLO Pilot, 100 MWe Uvation Expansion
feed.summary: Terra Innovatum Global (NASDAQ: NKLR) signed a Letter of Intent with Uvation on November 20, 2025, for a 1 MWe SOLO micro-modular reactor pilot to power a modular data center, with an option to expand to 100 MWe across multiple sites. This strategic partnership aims to provide CO₂-free, behind-the-meter, high-density power for Uvation’s AI and data center expansion, addressing grid constraints and ensuring resilient energy supply. The agreement represents a significant step for Terra Innovatum's SOLO technology in supporting the rapidly growing AI infrastructure needs.

feed.title: Terra Innovatum Global and Uvation Launch 1 MWe Pilot Deployment with 100 MWe Expansion Option to Power Next-Gen AI and Modular Data Center Growth
feed.summary: Terra Innovatum Global and Uvation Inc. have signed a Letter of Intent to launch a 1 MWe pilot program for micro-modular nuclear reactors to power Uvation’s AI and data center infrastructure. This strategic partnership includes an option to scale up to 100 MWe, addressing the critical need for reliable, high-density power for rapidly growing AI and high-performance computing demands. The initiative aims to provide a resilient, carbon dioxide-free energy source for next-generation modular data centers, overcoming traditional grid limitations and accelerating AI commercialization.

feed.title: Terra Innovatum Global and Uvation Sign Strategic 1 MWe Pilot Deployment with 100 MWe Expansion Option to Support Next-Generation AI and Modular Data Center Growth
feed.summary: Terra Innovatum Global and Uvation Inc. have signed a Letter of Intent for a strategic partnership focusing on a 1 MWe pilot program to power Uvation's AI and data center infrastructure, with an option to expand to 100 MWe. This collaboration aims to provide a resilient, behind-the-meter energy source using Terra Innovatum's SOLO micro-modular reactor to meet the rapidly growing demand for AI infrastructure, which is currently outpacing traditional grid capabilities. The initiative seeks to overcome power shortages and enable scalable, CO2-free energy solutions for next-generation data centers.

feed.title: Terra Innovatum Begins Early Industrial Production of SOLO Micro-Modular Reactor in Partnership with ATB Riva Calzoni
feed.summary: Terra Innovatum (NASDAQ: NKLR) has initiated early industrial production of its SOLO micro-modular reactor through an agreement with ATB Riva Calzoni in Italy. This partnership aims to leverage ATB's facilities and expertise to establish scalable and cost-efficient manufacturing processes, while Terra Innovatum completes the U.S. licensing process. The collaboration is expected to accelerate the commercial deployment of the SOLO reactor, designed for rapid and scalable clean energy solutions.

feed.title: Terra Innovatum Launches Early Industrial Production Activities for SOLO Micro-Modular Reactor with Strategic Manufacturing Partner ATB Riva Calzoni
feed.summary: Terra Innovatum has partnered with ATB Riva Calzoni to initiate early industrial production activities for its SOLO™ micro-modular reactor in Italy. This collaboration aims to establish efficient manufacturing processes, component costs, and logistics for the first-of-a-kind SOLO reactor. The agreement seeks to accelerate commercial deployment by leveraging ATB's expertise and facilities, ensuring scalable, cost-efficient production and de-risking commercialization.

feed.title: Terra Innovatum Global to Participate at Upcoming Investor Conferences
feed.summary: Terra Innovatum Global, a developer of micro-modular nuclear reactors (NASDAQ: NKLR), announced its executive team will participate in several investor conferences from October 29 to December 11, 2025. The conferences will provide updates on the company's progress towards delivering and commercializing its SOLO™ micro-modular solution by 2027 and 2028, respectively. The company aims to make nuclear power accessible through scalable, affordable, and deployable micro-reactor solutions.

feed.title: Terra Innovatum Global Files New Investor Presentation Updating Timeline for First-of-A-Kind SOLO™ Deployment in 2027 from 2028 - Yahoo Finance
feed.summary: Terra Innovatum Global N.V. (NASDAQ: NKLR) announced an updated timeline for the deployment and commercialization of its SOLO™ micro-modular nuclear reactor. The company now anticipates the first-of-a-kind (FOAK) SOLO™ deployment in 2027, with commercialization following in 2028, accelerating its previous schedule by a year. This update, detailed in a new investor presentation, highlights key regulatory milestones for achieving its 2028 commercialization target.

feed.title: Terra Innovatum goes public via SPAC - Nuclear Engineering International
feed.summary: US nuclear start-up Terra Innovatum has gone public via a SPAC merger with GSR III Acquisition Corp (GSRT). The combined entity, now Global NV, will trade on the Nasdaq as NKLR. This move aims to accelerate the commercialization of its SOLO micro-modular reactor, designed for clean energy solutions in data centers and off-grid sites.
